thread.title: Was this First Dates' most awkward moment EVER? Woman furious as man suggests to 'go Dutch' on bill
thread.title_full: Was this First Dates' most awkward moment EVER? Woman furious as man suggests to 'go Dutch' on bill

author: Hayley Minn
title: Was this First Dates' most awkward moment EVER? Woman furious as man suggests to 'go Dutch' on bill
text:
Was this First Dates' most awkward moment EVER? Woman furious as man suggests to 'go Dutch' on bill It was all going SO well for Elaine and Steve until it came to paying! Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Most Awkward First Dates moment EVER? Man forces woman to 'go dutch' Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
First Dates had the most unbearably awkward moment EVER in tonight’s episode, as one woman got furious at her date’s suggestion to “go Dutch” on the bill. 
It was all going SO well for Elaine and Steve on the Channel 4 show, as they danced together in the restaurant. 
But things escalated VERY quickly, when he asked if she wanted to split the bill. 
In the toe-curling moment, Elaine looked so taken aback at her date’s suggestion. Read More Steve wanted to "go Dutch" on the bill (Photo: Channel 4) Elaine was NOT impressed (Photo: Channel 4) 
Speaking to camera, she said: “I have my concerns about the bill but I’m going to reserve judgement for once I’ve spoken to him.” 
However, it didn’t get much better once she’d confronted Steve. 
He said: “I’m all about equal opportunities.” 
But Elaine said: “My dad always said, ’Start the way you mean to go on’.” 
And the couple both decided they weren’t going to see each other again. Read More It was the most awkward First Dates moment EVER (Photo: Channel 4) SO toe-curling! (Photo: Channel 4) 
Elaine added: “I don’t want to be with someone like that. I’m worth a lot more!” 
Viewers were absolutely cringing at the moment, with one saying: “OMG THIS BILL DRAMA. I'm horrified #FirstDates.” 
Another added: “#FirstDates OMG. I've never seen a bill payment look so awkward. She was not happy…” 
*First Dates continues on Channel 4 on Monday at 9pm Like us on Facebook
